name: The Ultimate Ice Cream Tale
description:
This is a 3D platformer about a blue sphere called "Bob". You are Bob. The story is:

Bob really likes ice cream. Bob finds out that the moon is made out of old but dellicios Ice Ceam! So Bob plans to get to Huston, then get on the Apollo 9 mission to get to the moon! And back!

A prototype is in development. This is prototype V1
